website_summaries.verdict: Unless slick style is your only concern, skip the Sony Xperia XA for a cheaper phone with better features.
pros: With a super-skinny bezel, the Sony Xperia XA is a great-looking phone that's comfortable to use in one hand
cons: Its low screen resolution, short-lived battery and meagre amount of built-in storage are major setbacks
Sony has loaded the phone with a horrible mess of bloatware

customer_reviews.title: NOT UNLOCKED
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would. I recently bought two other Sony phones and they worked like a charm. Popped my sim card in and had no issues whatsoever but oh no not with this one...I tried my t-mobile sim and two other gsm carriers sim but it keeps asking for SIM NETWORK UNLOCK PIN.This was a gift for someone in the Caribbean so I ended up having to take it back with me to the US for a return; major inconvenience!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mellissa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cell phone
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant shape and good quality cell phone in reasonable price. When I went to AT $T store to set up SIM card, service people loved it a lot since Sony cellphones are not vey popular in US.
customer_reviews.author: Jovita Chow

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: All in all a great phone, especially for the price. Nice aluminum back, good screen, and the battery is about average. I'm a heavy phone user, Netflix and Pandora all day, and so far the battery can last me at least the entire day. The camera quality actually shocked me, it's fantastic for a budget phone or even a higher end device. All in all I think it was a good purchase. One complaint would be the fact that the phone did not come with headphones, but heck that's a small complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Kind of cool but I will replace as soon as I get around to it
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone but kind of a slow processor compared to new expensive phones, the camera works when pointed down but lift it to take a picture and the thing disappears that you press to shoot. So forget about using the camera. Then there is the issue with the phone being from south america, when texting it wants to autofill words with spanish. Changing all settings to english does nothing to fix this. Takes twice as long to send a text! I will be replacing this phone in a week or two! Then I'll have to sell it for half what I paid here just to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Karr Knutt

customer_reviews.title: I love this cell it's has everything I need in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a Sony electronics lover, I love this cell it's has everything I need in a cellphone and more, I am still exploring it.one questions I have is this cell 2 sims
customer_reviews.author: mirtha taylor

customer_reviews.title: Durability is the best for people who are like me. 19 DIFFERENY
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone it has outdated touchscreen response battery life has not been good at all due to the fact that phone was frozen when it came in. DURABILITY LASTED LONGER THAN I EXPECTED. AFTER 19 PHONES BROKE AND BOUGHT LAST YEAR. I had to mention the proper details I am typing my review with this SONY XPERIA and I am honestly happy to tell you that these phones have lasted longer than so many of my Samsung phones. Take it easy and buy one of these phones for you or your favorite person.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel W

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: do not buy this phone if you're living in NYC, the mobile data will not work. i don't know about other networks but mine is T mobile and it is not working. Customer service for T mobile confirmed it will not work and now i have to go through the headache of returning the phone. why didn't they clearly say this before i buy it? some people enjoy wasting time
customer_reviews.author: George botros

customer_reviews.title: Don't even think about it.
customer_reviews.text: Phone is a piece of crap. First I had to return it for the external speaker failing. it has always taken a long time to charge buy the other day it became uncomfortably warm in my pocket. Now it ony work connected to the charger. Previously I had an Apple Iphone 4 for 4 years and it still work better than this loser. I bought on Sony name and price, boy was that a mistake. All I can do now is have it repaired under warranty and put it on swap shop for $50.
customer_reviews.author: kunner

customer_reviews.title: Sony should have stuck with Walkmans
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy a Sony phone again. Bloatware that you can't disable and that updates itself using cell data instead of over Wi-Fi as selected. After an Android update, the phone would not reliably ring or sound the alarm clock. It took a month for Sony to fix the issue and were cagey about it being a Sony issue. Multiple help forum responses had people removing apps until they found the culprit when this was a known issue during previous updates. The phone itself is pretty standard, although slow and frequent apps not responding. In short, Sony should have stuck with Walkmans.
customer_reviews.author: Shannabanana

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL GARBAGE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone was set up to work in latin America not in the USA. IT WILL NOT ALLOW PICTURE OR VIDEO MESSAGES LIKE EVEN THE WORST CHEAP PHONES DO. It took hours just to be able to view youtube then stopped working. calls and regular text messages work, but I am limited to only that and its unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: bbbb

customer_reviews.title: Good little android phone
customer_reviews.text: Works properly when you don't put too much apps. Seems to slow down when you have many and honestly the small memory won't let you fill it up with a lot of apps. Can't even transfer all apps to a micro SD card as it retains partial memory in the main storage.
customer_reviews.author: Fourblades

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, NO wifi calling at all.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, it does "almost" everything my previous $600+ phone did.. It will be five (5) stars if it had WiFi calling as an option (as some other Sony models do).
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone, albeit some apps do run a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone, albeit some apps do run a bit buggy on it. Can't fault the phone, that'd be down to the app or the Android version that is running on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: RetiredMosin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a smaller hand, most of the the bells and whistles of a new $800 phone for fraction of the price. I.d like to see a new Sony with a small foot print as small as the Experia XA with a 23mpx camera.
customer_reviews.author: Sam M

customer_reviews.title: Short life span
customer_reviews.text: When it worked it was a greart phone, but I've only had it five months and the charge port stopped working. Now it won't charge past 0% and I'm getting white and green lines on the charge screen. Did all the trouble shoots and didn't fix anything.
customer_reviews.author: Mctavish96

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery life, cannot charge even when I used the different charger
customer_reviews.text: I bought my mom this Sony Xperia XA. At first, I was really excited about the picture quality when I had a video call. 2 months later, my mom can't charge the phone anymore even though she tried to change either the cable or the charger. I called Sony but they can't help because at that time my mom with that phone was in Vietnam. I felt really bad about the quality of this phone. I chose Sony because of its quality but they made me disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tu T.

customer_reviews.title: would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone!! Haven't had any problems with it, run smoothly, doesn't freeze and runs my games apps nicely. Would recommend this phone. Also love the rose gold.
customer_reviews.author: Erie'Anna Mc

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible phone. Already returning it!
customer_reviews.text: This phone looked nice out of the box, but that was it! It wouldn't update anything properly, kept performing the same sony and android update over and over again. The phone had no IEMI number until i had to reset it 4 times. The keyboard was glitchy and the phone overall was annoying! I just got it today and already not putting up with it. This is the worst of the Sony phones! The XA is not a good phone. Atleast mine wasn't. Defective.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Nadeau

customer_reviews.title: It's legit.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in the mail today. A bubble wrapped around the box it came in and it looked repackaged. Came with no manual (not that I'd need one) or headphones. I slid my old Sim card into it's mini Sim card slot and signed in with my old phone number intact. I'm using atandt Lte. So it was definitely unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: Tefaly Marcus

customer_reviews.title: IT IS NOT UNLOCKED!
customer_reviews.text: WHEN I PUT THE SIM CARD IT NEEDS A "SIM NETWORK UNLOCK PIN" I TRIED WITH A LOT OF DIFFERENT SIM CARDS AND DOES'NT WORK, AMAZON DID NOT GIVE ME A REFUND OR CHANGE. SO I TRIED TO CONTACT THE SELLER AND THEY DON'T ANSWER MY E-MAILS. I LOST MONEY. TRUST ME DON'T BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Don't allow the modest price reel you in, it's an iPod touch with no data connection.
customer_reviews.text: WILL NOT WORK ON T-MOBILE SATS. IN U.S. Phone is meant for Mexico, and is either locked (even though it states otherwise) simply does not have the means to connect to what was described.
customer_reviews.author: K1NGPE4SENT

customer_reviews.title: Nice Deal
customer_reviews.text: awesome phone for the price I got it for, battery life is not great enough to get me through the day with heavy use, but with normal texting and calling it gets me through the day and then some. My previous phone had broke and this was a quick and nice replacement! never used sony brand phones before and so far Im liking it (:
customer_reviews.author: Vianca

customer_reviews.title: Sony Xperia xa!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase as an unlocked phone but keep asking for Sim network unlock PIN. I go as far as to enter my t-Mobile sim pin and still no luck. Went online and try to purchase code and keep getting back refund with no help.
customer_reviews.author: Shimpy

customer_reviews.title: WORST XPERIANCE EVER FOR $200
customer_reviews.text: The phone didn't last a month and the screen started having a foggy like colour and sometimes lines from top to bottom. Amazon told me their warranty is already expired so I cannot return it. It's a piece of crap for almost $200 going to waste!! I presume Amazon sold me a used phone!!
customer_reviews.author: robert ngugi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful phone.
customer_reviews.text: I don't want smaller bezels or a larger screen, so I personally love the size and shape of this phone. It's pretty sexy as phones go. It runs quite smoothly, and the build quality is actually excellent! The main downside is just the battery. It's okay, but not great, as most new phones have better battery life I think.
customer_reviews.author: Dane R.

customer_reviews.title: Dont even try it
customer_reviews.text: The Cellphone Die after 4 MONTH of Use and Amazon do not cover the Warranty after 1 Month you have to go straight to Direct MFG, Terrible unit do not waste your Money, I ship this Phone to Cuba so pretty much i Loss my money.
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Its light weight and perfect fit for smaller hands
customer_reviews.text: I love the battery life of this phone. I've been playing this one game for 2 days straight and I'm only at 43%... I have small hands but this phone fits perfect. I also love the color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's not unlocked
customer_reviews.text: I am so mad because its not unlocked. I've been trying to get in touch with the seller but it has been unsuccessful as this is the only product I have bought where I don't see that option. Tried to contact amazon customer service but got no help there. When I placed my sim card inside it asked for unlock code. The worse part is that I left the country with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Was not unlocked when purchased but
customer_reviews.text: I am in the Caribbean and I contacted the seller and got the unlock code thanks again!! The phone now works.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for the price. Excellent backup phone.
customer_reviews.text: Not water resistant but still a good phone even though the headphone jack didn't work. I'd have to use Bluetooth headsets or headphones to listen to music.
customer_reviews.author: JASON GUTIERREZ

customer_reviews.title: Sony at its best
customer_reviews.text: I've had my phone about 6 months now and it has standed the test of time I have dropped, cracked and spilled and it is still holding on I now know that I will have to get another phone but it is tough so if you are a person who is clumsy but don't want a ugly phone this for you
customer_reviews.author: JASMINE

customer_reviews.title: Really good phone
customer_reviews.text: I am using this phone for more than three years and I bought it for my brother. Both of us are satisfied with the quality and ease of use. We love Sony brand.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: phones look good but the software was slow compared to this generation

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I's sure it's saved my phone from breaking after being dropped several times. However, dust and dirt get in the case and I still have to clean it out periodically.
customer_reviews.author: mar

customer_reviews.title: Nope...
customer_reviews.text: Don't get this phone! The touchscreen is unresponsive a lot and glitches as well. This is the first week of using it. Guess I will be going back to Samsung. Too bad because I like many Sony products.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Dident even know that Sony made phones This phone was world universal and I had MO problons getting it hooded up n switched.. I love this phone

customer_reviews.title: Replacement phone for my mom

customer_reviews.title: Don't worry about it the phone is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone great size fast and best thing about it it's andoird with Sony's best Suport curved glass I would definitely recommend it to my friends

customer_reviews.title: Battery die with in a day with fully charged. Shipping take too long to received.

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy

customer_reviews.title: Locked phone
customer_reviews.text: DO Not buy from QUICKDEALZZ!!! Received the phone (Sony Xperia XA) few hours ago. The phone is locked to ATT network.

customer_reviews.title: Very good for gaming!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this photo will be buying XA1 next they send unlock code and it worked flawless

customer_reviews.title: Usable for little over a year
customer_reviews.text: This phone did not age well. The processor speeds slow considerably with use, the battery life was small from the start and deteriorated FAST. Much better choices out there.

customer_reviews.title: No phone was inside the box and yes the box was sealed
customer_reviews.text: No phone was inside the box .... only a charger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone broke 2 months after purchase. Screen flashing nonstop ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone broke 2 months after purchase. Screen flashing nonstop. Physically giving me a headache. Contacted the seller and they told me to contact Sony. Contacted Sony and they gave me an estimate time of 1 month for warrenty repair. If you are looking for a reliable phone, do not buy this POS
customer_reviews.author: Wilson P.

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this guy
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this guy, bought to replace an iPhone 5s. Works well with ATT (unlocked) and I recommend this phone to my friends for its value and utility.

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen does its own thing
customer_reviews.text: After about 5 months of usage, the touch screen went crazy, opening and closing programs by itself, almost impossible to use. We did get a refund an now looking for a non-Sony phone.

customer_reviews.title: Battery and sound are horrible
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is short. Sound is very faint compared to every other phone I've ever had. I can't hear the alarm.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for me

customer_reviews.title: Unable to unlock the phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone was in good condition, comes with an a&t sim card. I have tryed several times to unclock that phone, but wasn't successful.thats why I have returned the phone back to the Amazon. I think I got my refund to.
customer_reviews.author: Raman

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this to replace my windows phone but its worse than that
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my windows phone but its worse than that. All xperia devices cant format sd cards to internal, it restarts and freezes after the 7.0 update and it cant hold a charge. Im going back to my Lumia 550. at least i never had any of these problems with a low end windows phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The battery life isn't totally amazing but i do love the camera quality very much
customer_reviews.text: The battery life isn't totally amazing but i do love the camera quality very much. As I'm really big into social media. I would recommend if you do purchase this phone to buy an SD card if you enjoy taking pictures or know that you use apps. Overall I enjoy this phone. It's really good for the price.

customer_reviews.title: The item has been unboxed
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new one but received an unboxed one. Dust on the charger and cables

customer_reviews.title: The Great Sony Xperia XA
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It is really good for international calling and video calls. The internet function on it is also exceptional. I have really enjoyed it. I have recommended this phone to my friends. Many of my friends also enjoy it also!!!

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money

Keypad could be a tad smaller, to make it easier for one hand dialing,,,I have piano fingers, and still cumbersome to dial.

customer_reviews.author: Mark D

customer_reviews.title: Great Sony Phone
customer_reviews.text: Sleek looking phone with iffy battery life but doesn't affect me as i am a casual user. Very beautiful interface with no noticeable lag w the operating system. It's a nice metal bumper with a plastic back. Mid range phone gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: alfredo marquez

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, good battery
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price: Good camera, good battery, good performance, slim and small compared to other phones in the market, I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Adenisa Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but disappointing quality
customer_reviews.text: Camera is great, battery life is okay but a month after receiving it, which. Was a replacement if the one I originally ordered that did not work, this one has started dropping the audio of phone calls. The call is still ongoing but no sound comes from the ear speaker or speaker phone. It happens multiple times a day and I have to end the call and call people back all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mummert

product_meta.title: SONY Xperia XA F3113 16GB GSM Phone Lime Gold
product_meta.description: Style:Phone Only| Color:Lime GoldThe Xperia XA has the latest Sony design and technology at an affordable price. The 5” borderless display gives you less bezel and more view. Sony’s Exmor RS 13MP main camera and 8MP front-facing camera can capture quick shots with a dedicated camera key. The Octa-core processor delivers reliable power and performance, and a 2300mAh battery lasts up to two days to keep you going.
feature_bullets: 5” borderless display gives you less bezel with more view
Sony’s Exmor RS 13MP main camera has super-fast 0.15s Hybrid Autofocus for blur free shots,1/3" sensor size, 1.12 µm pixel size, geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection, HDR, panorama.
Sony Exmor R 8MP front-facing camera with a wide angle lens that fits everyone in the shot
16GB onboard memory and up to 200GB expandable with MicroSD card; Earphones are not included
SIM unlocked and compatible with GSM/LTE carriers utilizing GSM network such as AT&T, T-Mobile, Straight Talk, MetroPCS, Simple Mobile, Bright spot, Net10, h20 Wireless, Cricket Wireless
Model F3113; compatible with Nano SIM Cards
